author: Jeannine Everson
content:
Do most people here watch Dr Ken Berry on you tube, the go to carnivore Dr.
64 comments
Bev Bradley
Yes.

replies.content: My hubby and I watch him.
He's great and has youtube clips on just about anything to do with cv.
Him and dr Anthony Chaffee
I like him very much.
Dr Anthony Chaffee and Dr Paul Mason are even better
My personal opinion is also this^

Bridgette De Gouveia Probably, but Dr Mason doesn't post often enough and Dr Chaffee's videos are too long to squeeze in on the go. Dr Berry is Goldielocks - entertaining, informative, regular, and perfect-length videos.
He's an acquired taste. I have watched his videos but prefer watching & learning from others.
Tara Krkovska I completely agree. He takes too long to get to the point for me.
Dr Berry, Dr Chaffee, Dr Baker, Dr Mason

Admin
Craig Dat top 4 👌

I used to - until I saw a YT of him eating McDonald's patties. That was enough for me. Haven't watched him since. If he thinks Macca's even qualifies as "food" then he isn't someone I want to listen to.
Chris Smith alot of people eat burger patties from other fast food places,sometimes its a fast meal because your out and about and dont have time to eat
Geoff Hunter exactly! I can’t see him slamming down Maccas Pattie’s on the regular. I’d say it’s an on the go option.
He is good for beginner's to get the basics down
Yep and Dr Chaffee
I watch Dr Berry
I like him. I prefer Dr Anthony Chaffee. His podcast is great. And Dr Shawn Baker.
Trish Randall I like them too but for some reason I find Dr Berry easier to watch. The others can seem a little bit dry. Dr Berry has a big personality.

Keera Mitrokli yeah. I get that for sure. But I’m kinda the opposite. I like the real nitty gritty and over the top information in Dr Chaffees podcast. And I summarise it down to post in my group for those who can’t or won’t listen 😂😂. It’s been pretty popular 😉😂
Yes, I like him! Plus Bart Ray, Chaffee and Baker.
Yes and Dr Chaffee (up the play back speed).
I prefer Dr Chaffee, but I watch both and many others.
Yep! I really like him.
Documentary YouTube on FAT & FAT2 also The Magic Pill. Nina Teichoiz. Dr Robert Lustig, Dr Gary Fettke (Tassie), Dr Mindy Pelz on fasting. Plenty more.🇦🇺😎
Diane Clarke I would love a sequel to the magic pill.
Love Dr Berry but also Dr Chaffee and Bart Kay is hilarious. Don’t forget Shawn Baker, he’s the OG.
Yes!!
I remember when he was a brand new keto advocate.... 😁
Yes and also dr Paul Mason
Yup, love listening to Dr Berry's longer podcast sessions when I'm at the gym. Also listen to Shawn Baker and Anthony Chaffee. Paul Mason is also great, there's also Gary and Belinda Fetke.
Mark Mackenzie
YES
Prof. Bart Kay no fluff a bit raw for some.
Dr Baker and Dr Chaffee are my go to guy's
Yes! He has so much valuable information.
Dr Cwys is good too. His videos help with the veteran carnivores like myself. The changes you may have to make once you’ve healed and reached your goals.
I've watched an odd one but prefer the general public YouTubers who are telling their own story and how they navigate life.
Ken Berry, Paul Mason, Sean Baker, Anthony Chaffey, Bart Kay regularly and others occasionally

Yes,
Ken D Berry, MD is brilliant;-)
Also
Robert Kiltz, MD, Anthony Chaffee,
Dr. Bikman, - they all amazing 🤩

I lost confidence in
Dr berry after he recommended spam & frankfurts etc if u can’t afford real meat.
I thought that was a bit fanatical…
Jeannine Everson

replies.reply_by: Rowan Montgomery not if that’s all you can afford.
replies.content: Rowan Montgomery not if that’s all you can afford.

Jeannine Everson
I think u would be better off with beans & rice rather than spam.
It’s not a religion it’s just a WOE
Dr Shawn baker!
